decision_conditions: <p>Notwithstanding the approved plans, prior to first use of the hereby approved Air Source Heat Pump(ASHP), details of an enclosure the screen the ASHP, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The ASHP can only be used once the enclosure has been fully installed and said enclosure shall be retained and maintained for the duration of the existence of the ASHP.&nbsp; </p><p>REASON: To safeguard the special interest of the Listed Building and preserve and enhance the character and appearance of the Conservation Area</p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.
description: Installation of an air source heat pump to an extension of a listed building
